item.title: 【HD Live Performances】Coldplay - Live In São Paulo 2017 [1080p] | Official launch
item.description:
Note: this is a re-upload of a previous post.

Hello Everyone!
I bring you (again) this concert requested in my profile


Tracklist:
[A-Stage]
- A Head Full of Dreams
- Yellow
- Every Teardrop Is a Waterfall
- The Scientist
- Birds
- Paradise

[B-Stage]
- Always in My Head
- Magic
- Everglow

[A-Stage]
- Clocks
- Midnight
- Charlie Brown
- Hymn for the Weeknd
- Fix You
- Viva la Vida
- Adventure of a Lifetime
- Amazing Day

[C-Stage]
- Us Against the World
- In My Place
- Paulistanos

[A-Stage]
- Life is Beautiful
- Something Just Like This
- A Sky Full Of Stars
- Up&Up
- End Credits
